game.name: Pump to Escape
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 캡션 이용 가능, 음량 개별 조정, 키보드 전용 옵션, Steam Cloud, 통계, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Race alone or with a friend in a minecart through a chaotic cave, dodge traps, and conquer tough challenges. A humorous, demanding adventure full of surprises - perfect for quick “Just one more try!” sessions.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Race alone or with a friend in a minecart through a chaotic cave, dodge traps, and conquer tough challenges. A humorous, demanding adventure full of surprises - perfect for quick “Just one more try!” sessions.
